content: this kal is free to everyone the pattern with weekly installments as listed below is available by signing up on rowan connect https //www rowanconnect net/offers/f5lku9aj/checkout this is the only way to receive the pattern you need to register but it is free a link will be sent out to all who have registered on monday september 15th you can click on the link to download the pattern for more information about the kal please visit - https //www rowanconnect net/offers/f5lku9aj/checkout the rowan connect kal facebook group link is https //www facebook com/groups/620741256591207 this is a great group to answer questions that you may have about the kal as it progresses you will need a cushion insert approximately 16 42 cm to fit if you wish to add a zipper there will be a zipper tutorial given during the finishing weeks of the kal schedule release 1 monday 15th september release 2 monday 22nd september release 3 monday 29th september release 4 monday 6th october release 5 monday 13th october release 6 monday 20th october release 7 monday 27th october zoom meetups thursday 25th september 7-8pm bst thursday 16th october 7-8 bst casting off party - thursday 13th november 7-8 pm gmt yarn used rowan norwegian wool there are three colorways noelie kristen and aurora noelie cushion - 014 cloud dancer - 4 balls 018 ribbon red - 3 balls noelie throw - 014 cloud dancer - 8 balls 018 ribbon red - 4 balls kristen cushion 020 frost pink - 4 balls 023 red velvet - 3 balls kristen throw - 020 frost pink - 8 balls 023 red velvet - 4 balls aurora cushion 016 frost grey - 4 balls 1 ball each of the following 013 coastal fjord 011 daphne 017 emerald 012 golden nugget aurora throw - 016 frost grey - 8 balls 2 balls each of the following 013 coastal fjord 011 daphne 017 emerald 012 golden nugget
